menu.name: Holiday Feast
menu.description:
Delivery Only - Servings start at 10. Includes Oven Roasted Turkey or Applewood Smoked Ham, Mushroom Sauce, Cranberry-Apple Relish, Cranberry-Apple Stuffing, Fresh Baked Bread and your choice of 2 sides: Red Skinned Mashed Potatoes, Potato Gratin, Green Beans Almondine, Sweet Potato Soufflé, or Broccoli & Rice.
*Disposable chafing dish and sterno not included.  If you need hot setup, which includes a chafing dish and sternos, please see the miscellaneous category.
menu.category: Holiday Feast – Delivered To the Office
